Timeline

3 and 4 September (0900-1800)

  • Day 1

    0900-1000

    Report to UTOWN Auditorium
    for Registration

  • Day 1

    0930-1200

    Competition briefing and workshops by SLA, SAS and AON

  • Day 1

    1200-1300

    Lunch!

  • Day 1

    1300-1800

    Release of competition challenge
    and competition begins!

  • Day 2

    0900-1200

    Report to UTOWN MPSH
    and continue with project

  • Day 2

    1200-1300

    Lunch!

  • Day 2

    1300-1500

    Wrap up project
    and judging begins

  • Day 2

    1600-1800

    Prize presentation, closing ceremony
    and swag giveaway in
    UTOWN Auditorium

  • We're done!
    Come back
    next Year!
